page.title: 19Popular Games
page.content: One of the most popular games at the moment is conkers.This is because the conkers are now falling off the trees. To play conkers you first make a hole through the conker with a skewer then thread string through it.The idea is to break each others conker.Another popular game is snooker.It is also one of my favourites.On television at the moment is the Goya snooker match and my favourite player is Jimmy White. Snooker is played with a cue, 15 red balls and one each of yellow, brown, green, blue, pink, black, and a white cue ball.The idea is to pot the balls in the pockets of the table.You pot a red ball first then a coloured ball.The maximum break is 147.Today many children have computers and there are lots of games made for them.A favourite board game is Monopoly which has been enjoyed for many years.
